event.title: was shown on a Rand McNally relief map as late as 1906

data.event: It was shown on a Rand McNally relief map as late as 1906.

event.title: appeared under the name of Brazir, on the Pizigani brothers' 1367

data.event: The island first appeared under the name of Brazir, on the Pizigani brothers' 1367 map.
